ValidationRule.description: NICC-063759; Requires certain fields to be populated for BE5 Upgrade projects as they are needed to run aspects of automated email alerts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordType.DeveloperName = "PLCM_Migrations" && ISPICKVAL( AH_PLCM_Product__c , "BE4 to BE5 Upgrade") &&
OR( ISBLANK( BE4_Upgrade_Email_Address__c ) , ISPICKVAL( Region__c , "") , ISBLANK( Account_Manager__c ), ISPICKVAL( Account_Segment__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Integration_Type__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Private_Offer_Enabled__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( Vanity_URL__c , "") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm the following required fields are populated: BE4 Upgrade Email Address, Region, Account Manager, Account Segment, Integration Type, Private Offer Enabled and Vanity URL.
